{"step_by_step_thinking": "Zinc polycarboxylate cement is a type of dental cement. It is used for permanent cementation of crowns, bridges, inlays, onlays, and orthodontic appliances. The working time of zinc polycarboxylate cement is the time from the start of mix until the cement no longer can be manipulated usefully. According to dental material guidelines, the working time of zinc polycarboxylate cement is approximately 2-3 minutes.", "answer_choice": "C. 3 minutes"}
